title: We Nominate A Show Member To Travel To Space! + Lunchbox Prank Calls "Rodeo Drive" + Eddie Wrote A Candy Bar Jingle!
itunes:title: We Nominate A Show Member To Travel To Space! + Lunchbox Prank Calls "Rodeo Drive" + Eddie Wrote A Candy Bar Jingle!
description:
We draw names to nominate a show member for the first ever all-civilian flight to space. The winner of the drawing will have money donated in their name to make the trip! Lunchbox pranks calls the Hermès store to see if he can put a really expensive purse on layaway. Plus, Eddie shares the jingle he wrote for a new candy bar and reveals what Hershey’s said after submitting it to them for consideration!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
